ART_FIGHT_2024.TITLE: Art Fight 2024
ART_FIGHT_2024.DESCRIPTION: ปีแรกที่รินได้ลองเล่น Artfight และได้ทดลองวาดตัวละครหลากหลายรูปแบบค่ะ

RIN_LININ.TITLE: ลินิน (Linin)
RIN_LININ.DESCRIPTION: Linin, a 7 years old child. Her mom and dad bring her to their neighbor grandma funeral. She did not understand where the grandma had gone and what the funeral is. As she ponder about life. She follow the ant until she was in another world. She find some good nature people later to teach her how to travel between worlds. She try many time to cross many world until she find her original world. By that time, she is already an expert at world traveling and learn many skill.

COLLECTOR.TITLE: นักสะสม (The collector)
COLLECTOR.DESCRIPTION: He has many name but he don't care about them all and call himself the collector. He admire all those beautiful pieces and treasure, he will do anything to get them all into his collections. 'All those are mine' said the collector.

THE_WITCH.TITLE: แม่มดแห่งมิติ (The dimension witch)
THE_WITCH.DESCRIPTION: Some call her a witch. She will appear in front of you when you really want something so much that you can exchange your life for it. She will offer the equal trade to you. You can choose either to ignore the trade as its price is too high or accept it as you can finally get what you want all your life.
